name: path-autocomplete
description: Provides path completion for visual studio code.

path-autocomplete.extensionOnImport.description: Adds the extension when inserting file on import or require statements.

path-autocomplete.includeExtension.description: Adds the extension when inserting file names.

path-autocomplete.excludedItems.description: Allows you to exclude certain files from the suggestions.

path-autocomplete.pathMappings.description: Defines custom mappings for the autocomplete paths.

path-autocomplete.pathSeparators.description: Defines the separators for support outside string.

path-autocomplete.transformations.description: Custom transformations applied to the inserted text.

path-autocomplete.disableUpOneFolder.description: Disabled the .. option in the recommendations.

path-autocomplete.useBackslash.description: If enabled it will use backslash (\) as a path separator.

path-autocomplete.enableFolderTrailingSl.description: Enables the trailing slash on the folder path insertion.

path-autocomplete.ignoredFilesPattern.description: Glob patterns for disabling the path completion in the specified file types.

path-autocomplete.ignoredPrefixes.description: List of prefixes for which completions will be skipped.
